title: Adaptive Instructional Design Course Based on Learning Management Systems (LMS)

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Course for learner-customized educational design in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment.

learning_goals: Learners can propose personalized learning path designs by analyzing activity evaluation data for each learner
Learners can apply methods to set activity access restrictions based on proficiency levels in the Moodle platform
Learners can validate educational effectiveness through an iterative design process based on Design-Based Research (DBR) methodology

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
